amendatorysection.para: Food Code shall mean the 2009 Recommendations of the United States Public Health Service, Food and Drug Administration, except the definitions of adulterated food and food establishment and sections 2-103.11(K), 3-301.11(B), (C), and (D), 3-304.13, 3-501.16, 3-501.17, 3-501.18, 3-502.11, 3-502.12, 4-301.12(C)(5), (D), and (E), 4-603.16(C), 4-802.11(C), 5-104.11, 6-301.14, 8-101, 8-102, 8-201.11, 8-201.12, 8-201.13(A)(2) and (3) and (B), 8-201.14(C), 8-202 through 8-304, 8-401.10(B)(2), 8-402.20 through 8-403.20, 8-403.50 through 8-404.12, and 8-405.20(B). The term Food Code does not include the annexes of such federal recommendations.
